Would you like more information on sepsis?

It occurs when your immune system stops making an effort to fight an infection and turns on itself. It is a life-threatening condition and requires immediate medical response. For more information visit sepsis.org

responses: You most likely are not experiencing sepsis, if you suspect sepsis or any medical condition, you should seek medical attention from a qualified healthcare provider.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
If you are an infant or a senior, have serious or chronic illnesses, or a weakened immune system, then you are at higher risk of sepsis. For more information visit sepsis.org.
